text: Yi byakti mrta achila, yaka ami pichata jiraita karaicho arau tara babe nirdharana karaicho jyoti, yara madhyamata te'om manuhara bhitarata cala-phuraa karae, se'ijana byakti se'i byaktira darae neki yijana enekuraa andhakarata ache yaâ€™ra paraa si olaba noraarae? E'idarae'i kaphirasakalara krtakarmaka sobhaniya karai diya haiche
